q: A billion browser-based phones also means that Google can display advertisements to that many more people around the world. Already, even without achieving each of those developments, interesting services are available, Eric Schmidt said. We are at the point where, between the geolocation capability of the phone and the power of the phone's browser platform, it is possible to deliver personalized information about where you are, what you could do there right now, and so forth-- and to deliver such a service at scale, Eric Schmidt wrote. "he jumped" and "won't stay that long" at the company. He Was Pushed Eric Schmidt stepping down creates a "huge advantage" for Google, writes Danny Sullivan at Search Engine Land.
